channel.title: Overhead views of Blue Shift, Opposing Force, Decay
channel.description:
Wasn't sure whether to post this here or in "Ladies Club". Sorry if this was the wrong place.
I've been able to find overhead images of the maps in [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/16538-A-map-of-BM-s-Black-Mesa-Research-Facility/'][i]Black Mesa[/i][/url] (thanks, .RK), [i][url='https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/0/278/232697-black_mesa_research_facility_hl_map.jpg']Half-Life[/url][/i], [i][url='https://web.comhem.se/~u22377593/']Half-Life 2[/url][/i], and [url='https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2237608']the episodes[/url]; but I haven't been able to find ones of [i]Opposing Force[/i], [i]Blue Shift[/i], or [i]Decay[/i].
Does anyone have any, or know where I can find some?

item.title: Overhead views of Blue Shift, Opposing Force, Decay
item.dc:creator: NoriMori
item.description:
Wasn’t sure whether to post this here or in “Ladies Club”. Sorry if this was the wrong place.

I’ve been able to find overhead images of the maps in Black Mesa (thanks, .RK), Half-Life, Half-Life 2, and the episodes; but I haven’t been able to find ones of Opposing Force, Blue Shift, or Decay.

Does anyone have any, or know where I can find some?

Read full topic
item.source: Overhead views of Blue Shift, Opposing Force, Decay
